title: Biochemical Assay Titration
author: Opentrons
description: This Biochemical titration prepares your samples for an assay.
process:
Choose the amount of plates you wish to process. The maximum for this
protocol is 4 master plates and 4 output plates.
Download protocol and put into OT app.
Calibrate all containers needed.
Hit run and watch your robot do the rest!

markdown.title: Biochemical Assay Titration
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: This Biochemical titration prepares your samples for an assay.
markdown.process:
1. Choose the amount of plates you wish to process. The maximum for this
protocol is 4 master plates and 4 output plates.
2. Download protocol and put into OT app.
3. Calibrate all containers needed.
4. Hit run and watch your robot do the rest!
